statements: DELETE FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND impact_rating > 5;
DELETE FROM ReliefEfforts WHERE location = 'New York' AND total_expenses > 5000;
DELETE FROM EvaluationMetrics WHERE impact_score <= 5 AND relief_id = 10;
DELETE FROM relief_workers WHERE worker_id = 100 AND area_id = 1;
DELETE FROM relief_supplies WHERE supply_id = 50 AND quantity = 10;
DELETE FROM relief_efforts WHERE amount_spent > 1000 AND success = 'true';
DELETE FROM donors WHERE donation_amount < 500 AND donation_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Volunteers WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'F';
